html:
12.14.17  12:37 pm   Is red a color

     i will check

12.14.17  12:33 pm   When will you upload your next video

     when it is finished

12.14.17  12:27 pm   I like the new shirts but is there a possibility of there being one that has just your name and the umbrella?

     sounds boring, but i will consider it

     If not that's okay, I'll buy one of the other ones but I just thought I'd check. I realize that you can't please everybody and I'll respect that. Thank you.

12.14.17  12:20 pm   are the notes on your C-major scale shirt actually a C-major scale? i feel like there's extra stuff, but i'm not sure what it is

     that is based on a video

12.14.17  11:37 am   I remember. around March 2017 you had a YouTube channel called notbillwurtz.

     that's not true. that was someone else impersonating me.

     It had a few videos on it, but you deleted the channel. Why?

     i tried to get them to take it down, i explained to them that they were impersonating me, but they insisted that they were not impersonating me, because their name was 'not' billwurtz, and that it was clear that they were not bill wurtz. but it is clear to me that people thought it was me, for example you thought it was me. which is understandable because they were putting my pictures and videos on the channel

12.14.17  11:34 am    Do you do your own stunts?

     yes

      Or do you have a stuntman?

     it's a woman

12.14.17  10:51 am   Is making your mouth an 'O' shape and patting your cheeks with your hands an instrument?

     yes

12.14.17  10:40 am   how would i go about developing relative pitch?

     spend some time with an instrument

12.14.17  9:54 am   What's the best way to avoid spoilers?

     use tupperware

12.14.17  9:23 am   why do you think everyone is going crazy about merch right now?

     because i just started doing it, despite the fact that i hate it

12.14.17  7:59 am   Why is there something rather than nothing?

     there can be anything. there is a lot of both

12.14.17  7:54 am   Look, will – bill! I mean bill. Hi. What's this music thing you've been up to for quite some time now? Are you going to explain that anytime soon?

     i've been a musician for my entire life. i have been explaining that for many years now.

     Also why is Christmas?

     to boost q4 earnings, and celebrate the darkness

12.14.17  7:53 am   When your merch is ready, do you think you  will you put a category for it on this site? 

     yes, i just did

12.14.17  7:45 am   IS CAPS LOCK A GOOD BUTTON?

     i think so

12.14.17  7:44 am   are you just a college student desperately trying to make money off youtube,

     no

     and thats why videos take long?

     they take so long because i am trying to make them good

12.14.17  7:42 am   how often do you think

     it seems like i am doing it constantly

12.14.17  7:40 am   What does 'turn down for what' mean?

     why would we turn down? why should i turn down? do not ask us to turn down, we are not going to turn down

     Does 'turn down' mean 'party'? 

     no, it means turning down the party, lowering the volume of the party, or reducing the magnitude/amplitude of the party

12.14.17  7:37 am   ive memorized the entire song "The Big Bang Theory" but can't remember what year the ottoman empire collapsed. do you know why my brain does this, and does anyone?

     yes. the things that take place during your lifetime might be a little easier to remember. that makes sense

12.14.17  4:16 am   i never actually saw chestnuts roasting on an open fire

     i don't think i've ever seen a chestnut, anywhere

12.14.17  3:23 am   i promised my professor i could do a history video on the history of camels in a similar style to yours so i wouldnt have to write a paper and he agreed and now it's due in 9 hours and i just finished RESEARCHING and am so lost that i am HERE hahaha life is nuts, right?

     if you have to do it in 9 hours then it won't be anything like mine

12.14.17  1:15 am   I hate buying presents at christmas time. is there something I could do instead?

     sell them?

12.14.17  1:05 am   girls are weird, agree?

     yes, boys are weird also

12.14.17  12:16 am   what are your recommendations for working through a creative block? i'm in a mild tussle with one right now & i've never been good at dealing with 'em

     go exploring, maybe twice if possible

12.14.17  12:08 am   Will you make original t-shirt designs,

     yes

      or will they all be frames from your videos?

     no

12.13.17  11:48 pm   why are you so comfortable being normal?

     i'm an acteur

12.13.17  11:19 pm   Where did you learn to do improvisation and music in general?

     at home, and in the work place

12.13.17  9:36 pm   Do you believe in nothing

     yes. it is not so much of a thing as a tactic

12.13.17  9:09 pm   how many aliens have hats

     as many as you can imagine!

12.13.17  8:35 pm   Are you raking in the dough? 

     right now i am using a spork

12.13.17  7:47 pm   reasons to smoke weed?

     maybe if you have too much weed

12.13.17  7:33 pm   what is your opinion on ASMR?

     ah, you mean the African Sex Mating Ritual. i think it's very useful in all kinds of every day situations

12.13.17  7:10 pm   Do you have any advice for following your dreams?

     start by understanding and analyzing your dreams

12.13.17  6:59 pm   when you think outside the box, what is the box?

     the way you are 'supposed' to think

12.13.17  6:39 pm   What do I do if the things I really wanna express the most are things that I don't know how to explain or put into words? 

     draw them?

12.13.17  5:53 pm   I went to a nearby Guitar Center and they had a synthesizer that played louder the harder you hit the keys. I feel as though this would make music all over the place every single time you play unless you perfectly matched the velocity of your fingers every time. What are your opinions on this? Do you think that some things shouldn't get extra gadgets added just for the sake of adding extra gadgets?

     keyboards are supposed to have this. when you play a real piano, loud notes are loud and soft notes are soft. when you talk or speak, you can say words louder or quieter. if someone strips away your dynamic capabilities, you will sound like a complete amateur even if you are not. it is very important to buy a keyboard with dynamic sensitivity (i.e. it can tell whether you hit it loud or soft)

12.13.17  5:35 pm   Are chances generally slim?

     no

12.13.17  5:29 pm   How can I 100% be sure that this square is truly a square. Sorry I don't have the attachment.

     measure it?

12.13.17  5:28 pm   I love the way you blend your vocals with the druns/percussion! Like that intro to murder your demon (the i'm gonna kill u part) is so  perfect. How do you do it? What's your secret!?!

     for that one i just played the drums in the same rhythm as the vocal

12.13.17  4:37 pm   If you place a cat in a tub filled with water, how do you know for sure that he hates it if you cant see him through the shower curtain? 

     until the cat is observed, the cat both likes it and hates it at the same time, and might be dead also, who knows

12.13.17  3:51 pm   do you often contemplate the mystery of existence?

     sometimes

     because it seems like you do. any theories as to why there's something rather than nothing?

     there can be any thing. i don't see how anyone could prevent that

12.13.17  3:45 pm   What do you think about ducks? 

      4.10.16  6:30 pm

12.13.17  3:01 pm   How did you get your shoe?

     it was free! with the purchase of another shoe

12.13.17  2:23 pm   If I make an 80s cop movie will you please make the music for it?

     i'm not currently looking for extra work, need to keep my schedule free to do my own work

12.13.17  2:13 pm   how does one cope with shitty things happening in the world that can't be fixed by a singular person without becoming apathetic and without wasting time worrying yourself into a wall

     stop watching the content on worry dot com

12.13.17  2:04 pm   should i get your capital letters report in its current state tattooed on my back

     no because it needs to be updated every time i use a capital letter on the questions page

12.13.17  1:43 pm   do you have any tips for getting a better ear for notes and pitches? the only instrument i can play is drums but i'm trying to learn keyboard but it's really hard because all the notes sound the same to me sometimes.

     they sound different to me

12.13.17  1:08 pm   Have you ever considered, in addition to iTunes, putting your music on Amazon Music so all the Amazon Echos can echo your music?

     i thought it was there already. it's supposed to be there. if anyone has any idea of whether it's there or how to get it there i would love to hear. these things are a nightmare. that's why i built my own site, to have a nightmare free zone

12.13.17  12:07 pm   When people were sending you anagram requests on the question page before you made the scarmble page, did you transfer all of those over after you made the page?

     yes

      Or are there some bonus anagrams dispersed around the question page? I don't know why I love reading those so much. 

     i meant to transfer them all

12.13.17  11:19 am   if you wanted to write a christmas-sounding song, how would you start?

     jackhammers?

12.13.17  11:18 am   what is the freedom bug?

     tfw you realize there is way more possibilities than u thought
